name: Hin Bus Depot
Description: Hin Bus Depot is a vibrant creative hub that transformed from an old bus depot into a dynamic space for contemporary art and cultural events. Known for its eclectic art exhibitions, community markets, and workshops, it blends Penang's heritage charm with modern creativity, making it a must-visit destination for art and culture enthusiasts.
Location: 31A, Jalan Gurdwara, 10300 George Town, Pulau Pinang.

name: Ya Hong Art Gallery
Description: Yahong Art Gallery attractively displays the original batik paintings of Chuah Thean Teng and his sons. Teng's works are avidly sought by both private collectors and museums throughout the world. Teng enjoys notability as the father and master of batik painting. He has transformed the ancient craft of batik into a fine art form. Although Chuah family's paintings occupy a prominent position in the gallery, Yahong also displays wide collection of arts & handicrafts that you will love bringing home! Yahong's engaging display of vivid art work will mesmerise the casual buyer as well as the serious art collectors
Location: 58 D, Jalan Batu Ferringhi, Kampung Batu Feringgi, 11100 Batu Ferringhi, Pulau Pinang

name: Nguni Designs
Description: It's where you could find unique & fascinating genuine & authentic tribal arts (artefacts) from Borneo & South East Asia & also from many African countries to add to your collections. Or you could take home some animal hides/rugs from around the world, of which were obtained from sustainable sources & professionally tanned. None of our hides/rugs are protected/endangered. Do come & visit us!
Location: 38, Stewart Ln, Georgetown, 10200 George Town, Penang

name: The Art Gallery
Description: The Art Gallery offers a rich insight into the culture and history of Malaysian Art. Exhibiting works completed by contemporary artist (such as Alex Leong, Calvin Chua, Ch'ng Kiah Kiean, Khoo Cheang Jin) as well as Pioneer Artists (such as Abdullah Ariff, Chuah Thean Teng, Khaw Sia, Kuo Ju Ping and Yong Mun Sen). The Art Gallery aptly showcases the renaissance of Malaysian art for the past 30 years.
Location: 368-4-8, Bellisa Row, Jalan Burma, Pulau Tikus, 10350 George Town, Pulau Pinang

name: The Star Pitt Street
Description: The Star Pitt Street, located in George Town, Penang, is a beautifully restored colonial building that once housed The Star newspaper's offices. Today, it serves as a cultural hub, hosting exhibitions, workshops, and events that celebrate Penang's rich history, diverse culture, and thriving arts scene. This iconic space blends heritage with creativity, making it a must-visit destination for art and history enthusiasts.
Location: 15, Jln Masjid Kapitan Keling, George Town, 10200 George Town, Pulau Pinang

name: Ming Fine Art Gallery
Description: Ming Fine Art Gallery is a contemporary art space in Penang, showcasing an impressive collection of traditional and modern artworks. With its refined and elegant ambiance, it offers visitors a unique experience of both local and international artistic expressions.
Location: 20, Stewart Ln, Georgetown, 10200 George Town, Penang

name: Galeri Seni Mutiara
Description: Galeri Seni Mutiara is a vibrant art gallery located in Penang, showcasing a diverse collection of contemporary and traditional artworks. It serves as a platform for both established and emerging artists, offering visitors a chance to experience the rich cultural heritage and artistic expression of the region. The gallery is known for its intimate atmosphere and carefully curated exhibitions, making it a must-visit destination for art enthusiasts.
Location: 31-12-16, Lebuh Nipah 5, Bukit Jambul, 11900 Bayan Lepas, Pulau Pinang

name: China House
Description: China House is a unique, multi-concept venue located in the heart of George Town. It blends art, food, and culture in an inviting atmosphere. Housed in a heritage building, the space features a caf√©, bakery, restaurant, and art gallery, offering a delightful experience for both art lovers and food enthusiasts. Its relaxed ambiance, combined with creative works and diverse culinary offerings, makes China House a must-visit destination for anyone seeking a mix of history, culture, and modern flair.
Location: 153, Beach St, Georgetown, 10300 George Town, Penang

name: Art Lane
Description: Art Lane is a vibrant and contemporary art space located in the heart of Penang. Known for its creative atmosphere, it showcases an array of works by local and international artists. The gallery features a diverse collection of paintings, sculptures, and installations, making it a hub for art enthusiasts and collectors. With its dynamic exhibitions and community events, Art Lane fosters a creative environment that celebrates artistic expression and cultural exchange.
Location: 127, Beach St, Georgetown, 10450 George Town, Penang
